text: Everyone's Hero is a 2006 American computer-animated sports comedy movie directed by Colin Brady, Christopher Reeve and Daniel St. Pierre. Starring the voices of William H. Macy, Rob Reiner, Brian Dennehy, Raven-Symon√©, Robert Wagner, Richard Kind, Dana Reeve, Jake T.
